snippet.title: Yokai Dungeon - OUT NOW!! Dungeon Crawler Game
snippet.description:
Yokai Dungeon is out now on iOS and Android. Randomized dungeons, puzzle arcade fun, and yokai await you!

☆☆ Play Yokai Dungeon ☆☆
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/yokai-dungeon/id1461745979
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.neutronized.yokaidungeon&hl=en_US

Yokai have just interrupted the lantern festival, it's up to Tanuki and his friends to save the day. Push blocks to crush the pesky yokai, explore randomly generated dungeons, and dive into beatiful Japanese folklore.

Features:
• Randomly generated dungeons.
• Unlock 20 heroes with unique stats.
• Equip items with special abilities.
• A journey into Japanese folklore.
• Multiple control types.
• Made with love!

Bored? Join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/vQxnUuB
